title: new missions
body:
im playing for the golden championschip ashe chroma but i dont get new missions.
i bought the master pass and did the missions now im stuck with the " complete 4 more  worlds missions" i did 3  but i dont get new once what now? do i need to wait till towmorrow or is it a bugg? 

plz help i want that chroma

replies.body: When does each new week for the missions start?
There will be new missions every week of worlds. If you purchaced the pass you'll get extra missions all the way.
